column4: i still use fc3 at work, because of the limited package set. work is just database, web server, samba. no internet connection, yada
i can't support the 'apt better than yum' with real numbers. i just know the downloading of headers for yum is gawd-awful slow. apt does it's business much quicker for me
oh, i'm convinced "dependancy hell" was coined by someone using rpm
